df-squarenn
blocks.content: Define the set of square positive integers. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 18-Sep-2014.)

blocks.name: df-pell1qr
blocks.content: Define the solutions of a Pell equation in the first quadrant. To avoid pair pain, we represent this via the canonical embedding into the reals. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 17-Sep-2014.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-pell1qr(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  |- wceq(cpell1qr, cmpt(s0, cdif(cn, csquarenn), crab(s1, cr, wrex(s2, cn0, wrex(s3, cn0, wa(wceq(cv(s1), co(cv(s2), caddc, co(cfv(csqrt, cv(s0)), cmul, cv(s3)))), wceq(co(co(cv(s2), cexp, nat2), cmin, co(cv(s0), cmul, co(cv(s3), cexp, nat2))), nat1)))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-pell1qr(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  ⊢ Pell1QR =(s0 ∈(ℕ \[]NN)↦ { s1 ∈ ℝ | ∃(s2 ∈ ℕ0, ∃(s3 ∈ ℕ0,(s1 =(s2[+]((sqrt ` s0)[×]s3))∧((s2[^]2)[-](s0[×](s3[^]2)))= 1)))})
  ⊣ d(s0, s3)
  ⊣ d(s1, s3)
  ⊣ d(s2, s3)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
}

blocks.name: df-pell14qr
blocks.content: Define the positive solutions of a Pell equation. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 17-Sep-2014.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-pell14qr(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  |- wceq(cpell14qr, cmpt(s0, cdif(cn, csquarenn), crab(s1, cr, wrex(s2, cn0, wrex(s3, cz, wa(wceq(cv(s1), co(cv(s2), caddc, co(cfv(csqrt, cv(s0)), cmul, cv(s3)))), wceq(co(co(cv(s2), cexp, nat2), cmin, co(cv(s0), cmul, co(cv(s3), cexp, nat2))), nat1)))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
}

blocks.name: df-pell1234qr
blocks.content: Define the general solutions of a Pell equation. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 17-Sep-2014.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-pell1234qr(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  |- wceq(cpell1234qr, cmpt(s0, cdif(cn, csquarenn), crab(s1, cr, wrex(s2, cz, wrex(s3, cz, wa(wceq(cv(s1), co(cv(s2), caddc, co(cfv(csqrt, cv(s0)), cmul, cv(s3)))), wceq(co(co(cv(s2), cexp, nat2), cmin, co(cv(s0), cmul, co(cv(s3), cexp, nat2))), nat1)))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
}

blocks.name: df-pellfund
blocks.content: A function mapping Pell discriminants to the corresponding fundamental solution. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 18-Sep-2014.) (Revised by AV, 17-Sep-2020.)

blocks.name: pell1qrval
blocks.content: Value of the set of first-quadrant Pell solutions. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 17-Sep-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm pell1qrval(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cdif(cn, csquarenn)), wceq(cfv(cpell1qr, c0), crab(s0, cr, wrex(s1, cn0, wrex(s2, cn0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), caddc, co(cfv(csqrt, c0), cmul, cv(s2)))), wceq(co(co(cv(s1), cexp, nat2), cmin, co(c0, cmul, co(cv(s2), cexp, nat2))), nat1)))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
} = {
  fvmpt(hs0, c0, cdif(cn, csquarenn), cpell1qr, crab(s0, cr, wrex(s1, cn0, wrex(s2, cn0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), caddc, co(cfv(csqrt, c0), cmul, cv(s2)))), wceq(co(co(cv(s1), cexp, nat2), cmin, co(c0, cmul, co(cv(s2), cexp, nat2))), nat1))))), crab(s0, cr, wrex(s1, cn0, wrex(s2, cn0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), caddc, co(cfv(csqrt, cv(hs0)), cmul, cv(s2)))), wceq(co(co(cv(s1), cexp, nat2), cmin, co(cv(hs0), cmul, co(cv(s2), cexp, nat2))), nat1))))))
  rabbidv(s0, cr, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wrex(s1, cn0, wrex(s2, cn0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), caddc, co(cfv(csqrt, cv(hs0)), cmul, cv(s2)))), wceq(co(co(cv(s1), cexp, nat2), cmin, co(cv(hs0), cmul, co(cv(s2), cexp, nat2))), nat1)))), wrex(s1, cn0, wrex(s2, cn0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), caddc, co(cfv(csqrt, c0), cmul, cv(s2)))), wceq(co(co(cv(s1), cexp, nat2), cmin, co(c0, cmul, co(cv(s2), cexp, nat2))), nat1)))))
  2rexbidv(s1, s2, cn0, cn0, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wa(wceq(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), caddc, co(cfv(csqrt, cv(hs0)), cmul, cv(s2)))), wceq(co(co(cv(s1), cexp, nat2), cmin, co(cv(hs0), cmul, co(cv(s2), cexp, nat2))), nat1)), wa(wceq(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), caddc, co(cfv(csqrt, c0), cmul, cv(s2)))), wceq(co(co(cv(s1), cexp, nat2), cmin, co(c0, cmul, co(cv(s2), cexp, nat2))), nat1)))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), caddc, co(cfv(csqrt, cv(hs0)), cmul, cv(s2)))), wceq(co(co(cv(s1), cexp, nat2), cmin, co(cv(hs0), cmul, co(cv(s2), cexp, nat2))), nat1), wceq(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), caddc, co(cfv(csqrt, c0), cmul, cv(s2)))), wceq(co(co(cv(s1), cexp, nat2), cmin, co(c0, cmul, co(cv(s2), cexp, nat2))), nat1))
  eqeq2d(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), caddc, co(cfv(csqrt, cv(hs0)), cmul, cv(s2))), co(cv(s1), caddc, co(cfv(csqrt, c0), cmul, cv(s2))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  oveq2d(cv(s1), caddc, co(cfv(csqrt, cv(hs0)), cmul, cv(s2)), co(cfv(csqrt, c0), cmul, cv(s2)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  oveq1d(cfv(csqrt, cv(hs0)), cmul, cv(s2), cfv(csqrt, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, csqrt)
  eqeq1d(co(co(cv(s1), cexp, nat2), cmin, co(cv(hs0), cmul, co(cv(s2), cexp, nat2))), nat1, co(co(cv(s1), cexp, nat2), cmin, co(c0, cmul, co(cv(s2), cexp, nat2))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  oveq2d(co(cv(s1), cexp, nat2), cmin, co(cv(hs0), cmul, co(cv(s2), cexp, nat2)), co(c0, cmul, co(cv(s2), cexp, nat2)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  oveq1(cv(hs0), c0, cmul, co(cv(s2), cexp, nat2))
  df-pell1qr(hs0, s0, s1, s2)
  rabex(s0, cr, wrex(s1, cn0, wrex(s2, cn0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), caddc, co(cfv(csqrt, c0), cmul, cv(s2)))), wceq(co(co(cv(s1), cexp, nat2), cmin, co(c0, cmul, co(cv(s2), cexp, nat2))), nat1)))))
  reex()
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cdif(cn, csquarenn))
  diff.hs0.c(crab(s0, cr, wrex(s1, cn0, wrex(s2, cn0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), caddc, co(cfv(csqrt, c0), cmul, cv(s2)))), wceq(co(co(cv(s1), cexp, nat2), cmin, co(c0, cmul, co(cv(s2), cexp, nat2))), nat1))))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s2, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.cr.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: elpell1qr
blocks.content: Membership in a first-quadrant Pell solution set. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 17-Sep-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm elpell1qr(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cdif(cn, csquarenn)), wb(wcel(c1, cfv(cpell1qr, c0)), wa(wcel(c1, cr), wrex(s0, cn0, wrex(s1, cn0, wa(wceq(c1, co(cv(s0), caddc, co(cfv(csqrt, c0), cmul, cv(s1)))), wceq(co(co(cv(s0), cexp, nat2), cmin, co(c0, cmul, co(cv(s1), cexp, nat2))), nat1)))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  syl6bb(wcel(c0, cdif(cn, csquarenn)), wcel(c1, cfv(cpell1qr, c0)), wa(wcel(c1, cr), wrex(s0, cn0, wrex(s1, cn0, wa(wceq(c1, co(cv(s0), caddc, co(cfv(csqrt, c0), cmul, cv(s1)))), wceq(co(co(cv(s0), cexp, nat2), cmin, co(c0, cmul, co(cv(s1), cexp, nat2))), nat1))))), wcel(c1, crab(hs0, cr, wrex(s0, cn0, wrex(s1, cn0, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(s0), caddc, co(cfv(csqrt, c0), cmul, cv(s1)))), wceq(co(co(cv(s0), cexp, nat2), cmin, co(c0, cmul, co(cv(s1), cexp, nat2))), nat1)))))))
  eleq2d(c1, cfv(cpell1qr, c0), crab(hs0, cr, wrex(s0, cn0, wrex(s1, cn0, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(s0), caddc, co(cfv(csqrt, c0), cmul, cv(s1)))), wceq(co(co(cv(s0), cexp, nat2), cmin, co(c0, cmul, co(cv(s1), cexp, nat2))), nat1))))), wcel(c0, cdif(cn, csquarenn)))
  pell1qrval(hs0, s0, s1, c0)
  elrab(hs0, c1, cr, wrex(s0, cn0, wrex(s1, cn0, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(s0), caddc, co(cfv(csqrt, c0), cmul, cv(s1)))), wceq(co(co(cv(s0), cexp, nat2), cmin, co(c0, cmul, co(cv(s1), cexp, nat2))), nat1)))), wrex(s0, cn0, wrex(s1, cn0, wa(wceq(c1, co(cv(s0), caddc, co(cfv(csqrt, c0), cmul, cv(s1)))), wceq(co(co(cv(s0), cexp, nat2), cmin, co(c0, cmul, co(cv(s1), cexp, nat2))), nat1)))))
  2rexbidv(s0, s1, cn0, cn0, wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(s0), caddc, co(cfv(csqrt, c0), cmul, cv(s1)))), wceq(co(co(cv(s0), cexp, nat2), cmin, co(c0, cmul, co(cv(s1), cexp, nat2))), nat1)), wa(wceq(c1, co(cv(s0), caddc, co(cfv(csqrt, c0), cmul, cv(s1)))), wceq(co(co(cv(s0), cexp, nat2), cmin, co(c0, cmul, co(cv(s1), cexp, nat2))), nat1)))
  anbi1d(wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(s0), caddc, co(cfv(csqrt, c0), cmul, cv(s1)))), wceq(co(co(cv(s0), cexp, nat2), cmin, co(c0, cmul, co(cv(s1), cexp, nat2))), nat1), wceq(c1, co(cv(s0), caddc, co(cfv(csqrt, c0), cmul, cv(s1)))))
  eqeq1(cv(hs0), c1, co(cv(s0), caddc, co(cfv(csqrt, c0), cmul, cv(s1))))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cr)
  diff.hs0.w(wrex(s0, cn0, wrex(s1, cn0, wa(wceq(c1, co(cv(s0), caddc, co(cfv(csqrt, c0), cmul, cv(s1)))), wceq(co(co(cv(s0), cexp, nat2), cmin, co(c0, cmul, co(cv(s1), cexp, nat2))), nat1)))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(hs0), c1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
}

blocks.name: pell14qrval
blocks.content: Value of the set of positive Pell solutions. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 17-Sep-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm pell14qrval(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cdif(cn, csquarenn)), wceq(cfv(cpell14qr, c0), crab(s0, cr, wrex(s1, cn0, wrex(s2, cz, wa(wceq(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), caddc, co(cfv(csqrt, c0), cmul, cv(s2)))), wceq(co(co(cv(s1), cexp, nat2), cmin, co(c0, cmul, co(cv(s2), cexp, nat2))), nat1)))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
} = {
  fvmpt(hs0, c0, cdif(cn, csquarenn), cpell14qr, crab(s0, cr, wrex(s1, cn0, wrex(s2, cz, wa(wceq(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), caddc, co(cfv(csqrt, c0), cmul, cv(s2)))), wceq(co(co(cv(s1), cexp, nat2), cmin, co(c0, cmul, co(cv(s2), cexp, nat2))), nat1))))), crab(s0, cr, wrex(s1, cn0, wrex(s2, cz, wa(wceq(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), caddc, co(cfv(csqrt, cv(hs0)), cmul, cv(s2)))), wceq(co(co(cv(s1), cexp, nat2), cmin, co(cv(hs0), cmul, co(cv(s2), cexp, nat2))), nat1))))))
  rabbidv(s0, cr, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wrex(s1, cn0, wrex(s2, cz, wa(wceq(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), caddc, co(cfv(csqrt, cv(hs0)), cmul, cv(s2)))), wceq(co(co(cv(s1), cexp, nat2), cmin, co(cv(hs0), cmul, co(cv(s2), cexp, nat2))), nat1)))), wrex(s1, cn0, wrex(s2, cz, wa(wceq(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), caddc, co(cfv(csqrt, c0), cmul, cv(s2)))), wceq(co(co(cv(s1), cexp, nat2), cmin, co(c0, cmul, co(cv(s2), cexp, nat2))), nat1)))))
  2rexbidv(s1, s2, cn0, cz, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wa(wceq(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), caddc, co(cfv(csqrt, cv(hs0)), cmul, cv(s2)))), wceq(co(co(cv(s1), cexp, nat2), cmin, co(cv(hs0), cmul, co(cv(s2), cexp, nat2))), nat1)), wa(wceq(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), caddc, co(cfv(csqrt, c0), cmul, cv(s2)))), wceq(co(co(cv(s1), cexp, nat2), cmin, co(c0, cmul, co(cv(s2), cexp, nat2))), nat1)))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), caddc, co(cfv(csqrt, cv(hs0)), cmul, cv(s2)))), wceq(co(co(cv(s1), cexp, nat2), cmin, co(cv(hs0), cmul, co(cv(s2), cexp, nat2))), nat1), wceq(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), caddc, co(cfv(csqrt, c0), cmul, cv(s2)))), wceq(co(co(cv(s1), cexp, nat2), cmin, co(c0, cmul, co(cv(s2), cexp, nat2))), nat1))
  eqeq2d(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), caddc, co(cfv(csqrt, cv(hs0)), cmul, cv(s2))), co(cv(s1), caddc, co(cfv(csqrt, c0), cmul, cv(s2))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  oveq2d(cv(s1), caddc, co(cfv(csqrt, cv(hs0)), cmul, cv(s2)), co(cfv(csqrt, c0), cmul, cv(s2)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  oveq1d(cfv(csqrt, cv(hs0)), cmul, cv(s2), cfv(csqrt, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, csqrt)
  eqeq1d(co(co(cv(s1), cexp, nat2), cmin, co(cv(hs0), cmul, co(cv(s2), cexp, nat2))), nat1, co(co(cv(s1), cexp, nat2), cmin, co(c0, cmul, co(cv(s2), cexp, nat2))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  oveq2d(co(cv(s1), cexp, nat2), cmin, co(cv(hs0), cmul, co(cv(s2), cexp, nat2)), co(c0, cmul, co(cv(s2), cexp, nat2)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  oveq1(cv(hs0), c0, cmul, co(cv(s2), cexp, nat2))
  df-pell14qr(hs0, s0, s1, s2)
  rabex(s0, cr, wrex(s1, cn0, wrex(s2, cz, wa(wceq(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), caddc, co(cfv(csqrt, c0), cmul, cv(s2)))), wceq(co(co(cv(s1), cexp, nat2), cmin, co(c0, cmul, co(cv(s2), cexp, nat2))), nat1)))))
  reex()
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cdif(cn, csquarenn))
  diff.hs0.c(crab(s0, cr, wrex(s1, cn0, wrex(s2, cz, wa(wceq(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), caddc, co(cfv(csqrt, c0), cmul, cv(s2)))), wceq(co(co(cv(s1), cexp, nat2), cmin, co(c0, cmul, co(cv(s2), cexp, nat2))), nat1))))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s2, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.cr.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: elpell14qr
blocks.content: Membership in the set of positive Pell solutions. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 17-Sep-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm elpell14qr(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cdif(cn, csquarenn)), wb(wcel(c1, cfv(cpell14qr, c0)), wa(wcel(c1, cr), wrex(s0, cn0, wrex(s1, cz, wa(wceq(c1, co(cv(s0), caddc, co(cfv(csqrt, c0), cmul, cv(s1)))), wceq(co(co(cv(s0), cexp, nat2), cmin, co(c0, cmul, co(cv(s1), cexp, nat2))), nat1)))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {

  anbi1d(wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(s0), caddc, co(cfv(csqrt, c0), cmul, cv(s1)))), wceq(co(co(cv(s0), cexp, nat2), cmin, co(c0, cmul, co(cv(s1), cexp, nat2))), nat1), wceq(c1, co(cv(s0), caddc, co(cfv(csqrt, c0), cmul, cv(s1)))))

  diff.hs0.c(c1)

blocks.name: pell1234qrreccl
blocks.content: General solutions of the Pell equation are closed under reciprocals. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 18-Sep-2014.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: pell1234qrmulcl
blocks.content: General solutions of the Pell equation are closed under multiplication. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 18-Sep-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm pell1234qrmulcl(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cdif(cn, csquarenn)), wcel(c1, cfv(cpell1234qr, c0)), wcel(c2, cfv(cpell1234qr, c0))), wcel(co(c1, cmul, c2), cfv(cpell1234qr, c0)))

blocks.name: pell14qrrp
blocks.content: A positive Pell solution is a positive real. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 19-Sep-2014.)

blocks.name: pell1234qrdich
blocks.content: A general Pell solution is either a positive solution, or its negation is. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 18-Sep-2014.)

  diff.hs1.w(wo(wcel(c1, cfv(cpell14qr, c0)), wcel(cneg(c1), cfv(cpell14qr, c0))))
  diff.hs2.s(hs3)

  diff.hs2.c(cz)
  diff.hs3.c(cneg(cv(hs0)))
  diff.hs3.c(cneg(cv(hs1)))
  diff.hs3.c(cz)
  diff.hs2.w(wa(wceq(cneg(c1), co(cneg(cv(hs0)), caddc, co(cfv(csqrt, c0), cmul, cv(hs3)))), wceq(co(co(cneg(cv(hs0)), cexp, nat2), cmin, co(c0, cmul, co(cv(hs3), cexp, nat2))), nat1)))
  diff.hs3.w(wa(wceq(cneg(c1), co(cneg(cv(hs0)), caddc, co(cfv(csqrt, c0), cmul, cneg(cv(hs1))))), wceq(co(co(cneg(cv(hs0)), cexp, nat2), cmin, co(c0, cmul, co(cneg(cv(hs1)), cexp, nat2))), nat1)))

blocks.name: elpell14qr2
blocks.content: A number is a positive Pell solution iff it is positive and a Pell solution, justifying our name choice. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 19-Oct-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm elpell14qr2(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cdif(cn, csquarenn)), wb(wcel(c1, cfv(cpell14qr, c0)), wa(wcel(c1, cfv(cpell1234qr, c0)), wbr(nat0, clt, c1))))

  pell14qrss1234(c0)

  mtod(wa(wcel(c0, cdif(cn, csquarenn)), wa(wcel(c1, cfv(cpell1234qr, c0)), wbr(nat0, clt, c1))), wcel(cneg(c1), cfv(cpell14qr, c0)), wbr(nat0, clt, cneg(c1)))
  mtbid(wa(wcel(c0, cdif(cn, csquarenn)), wa(wcel(c1, cfv(cpell1234qr, c0)), wbr(nat0, clt, c1))), wbr(nat0, clt, cneg(c1)), wbr(c1, clt, nat0))
  impr(wcel(c0, cdif(cn, csquarenn)), wcel(c1, cfv(cpell1234qr, c0)), wbr(nat0, clt, c1), wn(wbr(c1, clt, nat0)))
  sylancr(wa(wcel(c0, cdif(cn, csquarenn)), wcel(c1, cfv(cpell1234qr, c0))), wi(wbr(nat0, clt, c1), wn(wbr(c1, clt, nat0))), wcel(nat0, cr), wcel(c1, cr))
  0re()
  ltnsym(nat0, c1)

  adantrr(wcel(c0, cdif(cn, csquarenn)), wcel(c1, cfv(cpell1234qr, c0)), wbr(nat0, clt, c1), wcel(c1, cr))
  pell1234qrre(c0, c1)
  adantr(wcel(c0, cdif(cn, csquarenn)), wa(wcel(c1, cfv(cpell1234qr, c0)), wbr(nat0, clt, c1)), wi(wcel(cneg(c1), cfv(cpell14qr, c0)), wbr(nat0, clt, cneg(c1))))
  ex(wcel(c0, cdif(cn, csquarenn)), wcel(cneg(c1), cfv(cpell14qr, c0)), wbr(nat0, clt, cneg(c1)))
  pell14qrgt0(c0, cneg(c1))
  adantrr(wcel(c0, cdif(cn, csquarenn)), wcel(c1, cfv(cpell1234qr, c0)), wbr(nat0, clt, c1), wo(wcel(c1, cfv(cpell14qr, c0)), wcel(cneg(c1), cfv(cpell14qr, c0))))

  orel2(wcel(cneg(c1), cfv(cpell14qr, c0)), wcel(c1, cfv(cpell14qr, c0)))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm elpell14qr2(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈(ℕ \[]NN)→(c1 ∈(Pell14QR ` c0)↔(c1 ∈(Pell1234QR ` c0)∧ 0[<]c1)))
} = {
  impbida(c0 ∈(ℕ \[]NN), c1 ∈(Pell14QR ` c0), (c1 ∈(Pell1234QR ` c0)∧ 0[<]c1))

  sylancr((c0 ∈(ℕ \[]NN)∧ c1 ∈(Pell1234QR ` c0)), (0[<]c1 → ¬ c1[<]0), 0 ∈ ℝ, c1 ∈ ℝ)
  0re()
  ltnsym(nat0, c1)

blocks.name: pell1qrge1
blocks.content: A Pell solution in the first quadrant is at least 1. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 17-Sep-2014.)
blocks.origin:

  pell1qrss14(c0)

  leloed(nat1, c1, wa(wcel(c0, cdif(cn, csquarenn)), wcel(c1, cfv(cpell14qr, c0))))
  ex(wa(wcel(c0, cdif(cn, csquarenn)), wcel(c1, cfv(cpell14qr, c0))), wo(wbr(nat1, clt, c1), wceq(nat1, c1)), wcel(c1, cfv(cpell1qr, c0)))
  jaodan(wa(wcel(c0, cdif(cn, csquarenn)), wcel(c1, cfv(cpell14qr, c0))), wbr(nat1, clt, c1), wceq(nat1, c1), wcel(c1, cfv(cpell1qr, c0)))
  sylc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cdif(cn, csquarenn)), wcel(c1, cfv(cpell14qr, c0))), wbr(nat1, clt, c1)), wcel(c1, cfv(cpell1qr, c0)), wn(wcel(co(nat1, cdiv, c1), cfv(cpell1qr, c0))), wo(wcel(c1, cfv(cpell1qr, c0)), wcel(co(nat1, cdiv, c1), cfv(cpell1qr, c0))))

  biimpa(wa(wcel(c0, cdif(cn, csquarenn)), wcel(c1, cfv(cpell14qr, c0))), wbr(nat1, clt, c1), wn(wbr(c1, cle, nat1)))

  breq2d(c1, cle, nat1, co(nat1, cdiv, nat1), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cdif(cn, csquarenn)), wcel(c1, cfv(cpell14qr, c0))), wbr(nat1, clt, c1)))

  eqcomi(nat1, co(nat1, cdiv, nat1))

blocks.pretty:
thm elpell1qr2(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈(ℕ \[]NN)→(c1 ∈(Pell1QR ` c0)↔(c1 ∈(Pell14QR ` c0)∧ 1[≤]c1)))
} = {
  impbida(c0 ∈(ℕ \[]NN), c1 ∈(Pell1QR ` c0), (c1 ∈(Pell14QR ` c0)∧ 1[≤]c1))
  jca((c0 ∈(ℕ \[]NN)∧ c1 ∈(Pell1QR ` c0)), c1 ∈(Pell14QR ` c0), 1[≤]c1)
  sselda(c1, (Pell1QR ` c0), (Pell14QR ` c0), c0 ∈(ℕ \[]NN))
  pell1qrss14(c0)
  pell1qrge1(c0, c1)
  impr(c0 ∈(ℕ \[]NN), c1 ∈(Pell14QR ` c0), 1[≤]c1, c1 ∈(Pell1QR ` c0))
  sylbid((c0 ∈(ℕ \[]NN)∧ c1 ∈(Pell14QR ` c0)), 1[≤]c1, c1 ∈(Pell1QR ` c0), (1[<]c1 ∨ 1 = c1))
  leloed(nat1, c1, (c0 ∈(ℕ \[]NN)∧ c1 ∈(Pell14QR ` c0)))
  ex((c0 ∈(ℕ \[]NN)∧ c1 ∈(Pell14QR ` c0)), (1[<]c1 ∨ 1 = c1), c1 ∈(Pell1QR ` c0))

  syld3an2(c0 ∈(ℕ \[]NN), c1 ∈(Pell14QR ` c0), 1[<]c1, ((sqrt `(c0[+]1))[+](sqrt ` c0))[≤]c1, c1 ∈(Pell1QR ` c0))

  simp2(c0 ∈(ℕ \[]NN), c1 ∈(Pell14QR ` c0), 1[<]c1)
  3impia(c0 ∈(ℕ \[]NN), c1 ∈(Pell14QR ` c0), 1[<]c1, 1[≤]c1)
  sylancr((c0 ∈(ℕ \[]NN)∧ c1 ∈(Pell14QR ` c0)), (1[<]c1 → 1[≤]c1), 1 ∈ ℝ, c1 ∈ ℝ)
